Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery phiale mesomphalos; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of a lotus flower in added white outline with added red centres; top of rim glazed; exterior: surface much eroded; zigzag between lines.
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding the rim pattern, see Liverpool 56,21,526.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1969) (phase 2)
